page.title: 11TRAFFIC IN WALDERSLADE
page.content: {Traffic Census:} Along Churchill Ave. and Walderslade Road,in a quarter of an hour we saw 299 cars ,14 buses,83 vans,17 lorries 36 motorbikes,35 bicycles and 2 others.There were 2 milkfloats. {Road Conditions: The roads in some places were quite good but in other places the roads were worse. Along Walderslade Road near the Library the roads needed more repairing because the frost and snow had got to them.Some parts of the road have sloped to one side.One part of the road is higher than the other. {Traffic Congestion: The traffic along Walderslade Road and Churchill Ave. was free flowing except at the traffic lights where there was some congestion. The general flow of traffic was good with few hold ups.
